name: Bloody Bunnies
description:
Warning, the game is in very early access!

Replenish ammo by donating your blood, kill crazy rabbits. Hold on as long as possible, because the end is inevitable.

Controls:

  • movement – WASD
  • shot - LMB
  • revolded - R
  • exit – ESC
